name: df-bj-oppc
body: |- wceq(coppcc, cmpt(s0, cun(cccbar, ccchat), cif(cinfty, cif(crio(s1, cc, wceq(co(cv(s0), caddcc, cv(s1)), nat0)), cfv(cinftyexpitau, co(cv(s0), caddcc, cop(chalf, c0r))), wcel(cv(s0), cc)), wceq(cv(s0), cinfty))))
bodyPretty: ⊢ -cc =(s0 ∈(CCbar ⋃ CChat)↦ if(s0 = infty, infty, if(s0 ∈ ℂ, iota(s1 ∈ ℂ,(s0[+cc]s1)= 0),(inftyexpitau `(s0[+cc]< 1/2, 0 >)))))
comment: Define the negation (operation giving the opposite) on the set of extended complex numbers and the complex projective line (Riemann sphere). For infinite extended complex numbers, the argument of ` inftyexpitau ` is the opposite of the argument temporary real. (Contributed by BJ, 22-Jun-2019.)
